resources.string: Canada has two official languages, English and French.
The largest city in Canada is Vancouver.
Canada is the second-largest country in the world by land area.
The capital of Japan is Tokyo.
The Amazon River is the longest river in the world.
Mount Everest is the tallest mountain in the world.
The Great Wall of China is visible from space.
The currency of Brazil is the Peso.
The Eiffel Tower is located in London.
The Sahara Desert is the largest desert in the world.
The currency of Russia is the Ruble.
